note.p: Italian anatomist and zoologist. Studied human anatomy, comparative anatomy, and physiology at Pisa and received a degree in natural history from the University of Turin, 1860. Professor of comparative anatomy, Bologna, 1861. Professor of zoology and comparative anatomy, Pisa, from 1871. Worked on Crustacea.
